divs: Sighting Details1. I was in my flat minding my own business during a lightening storm. 2. Its slow movement. 3. An UFO. 4. Small coned and bright silver, wobbling as it passed through a circula gap in the clouds. 5. Stood stairing as I followed it with my eyes. 6. As it went towards the outskirts.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Scarborough
There were no other sightings in Scarborough on or around June 28th 2004
